summary: Liu Wen-lung's home is attacked by bandits led by Chou Chao. Liu's wife was killed, but his son Yu-long was saved by a faithful servant by hiding in a well.
cast: Ping Chin|Hua Yueh|Shao-Hung Chan|Pei-Shan Chang|Yu Chin Chang|Mien Fang|Ying-Chieh Han|Li-Jen Ho|Lin-Yeh Hsiao|Chin Hsu|Tung Hu|Hsiao-man Huang|Feng Ku|Tsan-Hsiung Ku|Jen Kwan|Wei-Lieh Lan|Kang Liu|Hung Lu|Ying Ma|Wai-Lin On|Peng Peng|Dean Shek|Yi Shen|Kam Siu|Ti Tang|Little Unicorn|Ping-Ou Wei|Hsiu Wen
title: Zhui hun biao
